createwiki-defaultmainpage:
__NOTOC__
== Welcome to {{SITENAME}}! ==
This Main Page was automatically created by a wiki creator (a volunteer who created this wiki per a request), and it seems it hasn't been replaced yet.

=== For the bureaucrat(s) of this wiki ===
Hello, and welcome at your new wiki! Thank you for choosing Miraheze for the hosting of your wiki, and we hope you will enjoy our hosting.

You can immediately start working on your wiki, whenever you want.

Need help? No problem! We will help you with your wiki as needed. To make a start we have added a few links about working with MediaWiki:
* <span class="plainlinks">[[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Contents|MediaWiki guide (e.g. navigation, editing, deleting pages, blocking users)]]
* [[meta:FAQ|Miraheze FAQ]]
* [[meta:Request features|Request settings changes on your wiki. (Extensions and Logo/Favicon changes should be done through Special:ManageWiki on your wiki]].

==== But Miraheze, I still don't understand X! ====
Well, that's no problem. Even if something isn't explained in the documentation/FAQ, we still are happy to help you. You can find us here:
* [[meta:Help center|On our own Miraheze wiki]]
* On [[phab:|Phabricator]]
* On [https://miraheze.org/discord Discord]
* On IRC in #miraheze on irc.libera.chat ([irc://irc.libera.chat/miraheze direct link]; [https://web.libera.chat/?channel=#miraheze webchat])

=== For a visitor of this wiki ===
Hello, the default Main Page of this wiki (this is the default Main Page) has not been replaced yet by the bureaucrat(s) of this wiki. The bureaucrat(s) might still be working on a Main Page, so please check this page again later!
createwiki-desc: An extension to easily create new wikis on a wiki farm.
createwiki-email-body:
Hello, you've recently requested a wiki at Miraheze and we are happy to tell you that it has now been created by one of our volunteers.

Thank you for choosing Miraheze, we wish you good luck with your new wiki!
createwiki-error-blacklisted: The subdomain you have requested can not be created. Please either request a new subdomain or contact system administrators for help.
createwiki-error-dbexists: A wiki with that database name already exists.
createwiki-error-requesternonexistent: The requester doesn't exist on Miraheze Meta.
createwiki-error-notalnum: The database name may not contain non-alphanumeric characters.
createwiki-error-notlowercase: The database name may not contain uppercase letters.
createwiki-error-notsuffixed: The database name doesn't end in a valid suffix (e.g. 'wiki').
createwiki-error-swiftcontainernot: Failed to create swift container for wiki $1
createwiki-error-usernotcreated: The requester user was not created on the wiki.
createwiki-help-reason: Please enter a sufficient summary describing the topic, scope, and purpose of the wiki you're requesting.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-creation: Notify me when my wiki has been created.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-rename: Notify me if my wiki is renamed.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-request-comment: Notify me when there is a comment on a wiki request.
echo-pref-tooltip-wiki-request-declined: Notify me if my wiki request is declined.
notification-header-request-comment: A request you are following has received a new comment:
notification-header-request-declined: Your request has been declined for the following reason:
requestwiki-edit-notloggedin: Sorry, you need to [$1 log in] before you can edit a wiki request.
requestwiki-edit-user: You do not have sufficient rights to edit this wiki request. Please be aware that you can only edit requests you have made with your current account.
requestwiki-error-csrf: Sorry, the request could not be submitted due to a loss of session data. Please submit the form again. If that doesn't work, please [[Special:Userlogout|log out]] and log back in.
requestwiki-error-invalidcomment: Your wiki request contains an invalid character. Please try requesting again, and if the problem persists [[Help center|please contact us]]
requestwiki-error-nodomain: You must specify either a subdomain or custom domain.
requestwiki-error-notallfilledin: You have to fill in at least the wiki name and language fields.
requestwiki-error-notime: There has been a problem processing your request. Please submit your request again
requestwiki-error-patient: You have already requested a wiki. Please be patient and one of our wiki creators should create it soon. If you need to request another wiki, please wait and you will be able to request later.
requestwiki-header: You are going to request a new wiki at Miraheze, great! We need you to fill in this form, before we can review your request. Your wiki request will be reviewed by a volunteer, and it can be tracked at the page that will be given when submitting your request. If you want a custom domain for your wiki (i.e. not a standard .miraheze.org subdomain), please read [$1 this] first. You must first choose a subdomain, and your custom domain will be configured afterwards. When you request a wiki, you automatically agree to our [[Dormancy Policy]].
requestwiki-label-bio: Will this wiki's main subject(s) be about living people?
requestwiki-label-comments: Comments (e.g. expand on the purpose of your wiki, describe its topics, and provide examples on the type of content it will contain):
requestwiki-label-customdomain-info: You must provide a subdomain above. If you want a custom domain for your wiki, please provide it below.
requestwiki-label-private: Private wiki (not readable by everyone; only readable by users given the member or sysop groups):
requestwiki-label-purpose: The purpose of this wiki is...
requestwiki-notloggedin: Sorry, you need to [$1 log in] before you can request a wiki.
requestwiki-success: Your wiki request ($1) was successfully submitted. Your request will be reviewed by a volunteer wiki creator as soon as possible.
requestwiki-unknown: No request exists with this ID.
requestwikiqueue-request-header-changest: Change the status of this wiki request
requestwikiqueue-request-header-requeste: Comment given by the wiki requester
requestwikiqueue-request-info-submission: Here you can modify the visibility of the request, approve or decline the request as well as provide additional comments when doing so. If you mark the wiki as approved, it will be created automatically.
requestwikiqueue-request-info-decline: You can modify the requests visibility when declining and provide a reason. The reason will be visible both in the request history and will be sent to the user directly.
requestwikiqueue-request-label-action: Mark this request action as an...
requestwikiqueue-request-label-visibilit: Everyone with 'read' can view this request
Everyone with 'delete' permissions can view this request
Everyone with 'createwiki' permissions can view this request
Everyone with 'suppressrevision' permissions can view this request
requestwikiqueue-request-status: Change the status of this wiki request
